fields.description:
On Android platform,An unexpected small box shown (intermittently) on closing the window inside the intent

This is not a regression.It also occurs on 2.1.0

Steps to Reproduce:

1. Install and Launch Test app
2. A button should appear "Press Me I error Ti SDK 1.8+", click it
3. Another button will appear "Press 2 Close" with a green border, click it for long.
 
Expected result

After step #2: Another button will appear and the first button and background image will visibly blur
After step #3: The second button will be dismissed, and you will return to view with the first button and red background

Actual result
After step #3: A small box is shown before the first window is displayed.
fields.summary: Android: Titanium.Android - An unexpected small box shown (intermittently) on closing the window inside the intent
fields.environment:

comments.body: Neha - It is not sufficient to check against 2.1.0 for the regressions. You should check it against 2.0.1 at least.

Issue reproduces with

Titanium Studio, build: 3.0.1.201212181159
Titanium SDK version: 3.1.0 (03/11/13 15:43 0c88429)
Titanium SDK version: 3.0.2 (02/07/13 16:46 a4def81)
Device: Samsung galaxy s duos Android version: 4.0.4

I am unable to reproduce this issue with the following environment;
Pixel (7.1)
Studio 4.9.0.201705302345
Ti SDK 6.1.1 GA
Appc NPM 4.2.9
Appc CLI 6.2.2
Ti CLI 5.0.14
Alloy 1.9.11
Xcode 8.2 (8C38)
Node v4.8.2
Java 1.8.0_131
